Hello blank fragment
"Material is the metaphor.\n\n"
"Quantum physics is the study of \n matter and energy at an atomic and subatomic level."

"Apparently, objects at a macroscopic level and fundamental level do act differently. 

" "The understanding of these unique characteristics can then be applied 
 to develop our pre-existing technology and methods. 

"
"Next >"
"< Previous"
1. SUPERPOSITION:
Some essential concepts related to quantum physics include:

"Quantum particles can be in different states at the same time.

 This characteristic is extremely useful for quantum computers.
"A quantum computer contains qubits (quantum bits) which represent both binary values (0 and 1) at the same time, \n"
"allowing certain processes to be done much faster in quantum computers compared to classic computers. \n (Classic bits can only store either\n 0 or 1 at a certain time.)"
"2. Uncertainty Principle"
"Measuring one property of a quantum particle would disturb its other properties. \n Therefore, two properties of a particle cannot be precisely known at the same time."
"3. Entanglement"

"Quantum particles have a special connection called entanglement. To precisely describe the properties of a quantum particle, the other connected particles also need to be observed. \n Obtaining information of one particle would allow you to understand another connected particle."
"The growth in the study of quantum mechanics allow us to: better secure communication among devices,"
"but at the same time also opens up an opportunity for hackers to easily penetrate existing encryption methods."
"This application will provide information regarding the usages of quantum physics in both perspectives."
"(Please check the menu bar on the top left to advance to other sections.)"
